summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 27580, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the location of undertaking establishments, morgues and crematories for the disposition of the bodies of the dead within certain districts within the City of Seattle, and prohibiting the construction and maintenance of undertaking establishment or morgues or crematories at any place within the city outside of such districts, and providing penalties for violation thereof", approved July 11, 1911.
